description:
Revolut is the money app designed to spend, save, and set money aside.

What's in store:
• Get your own customisable debit card and virtual cards to add to your Apple or Google Wallet (personalisation fees may apply)
• Send money between friends on Revolut (minimum age restriction applies)
• Receive money from everyone — even if they’re not on Revolut — with Payment Links
• Save and earn with a Savings account
• Get a 360º view of your money with Analytics
• If you’re in the UK, you can move to the main app once you turn 16

 
How does it work?
1. Download this app and create an account (if you're below the age of data consent, your parent will need to create an account for you from their Revolut app. You can check the age of data consent in your country below)
2. Get approved by your parent or guardian
3. Choose a debit card and customise it with text, stickers, and your own sketches (personalisation fees may apply), then order it from your parent's app
4. Add your card to Apple or Google Wallet to start spending straight away (minimum age restriction applies)
 
Parents and guardians, this part's for you ↓
With Revolut, they can manage their money independently, under your supervision.
Teens above the age of data consent can sign up themselves, but you'll have access to security controls, like spending notifications, in-app card freezes, and many other features to give you peace of mind.
If you have teens below the age of data consent, you can create an account for them from your Revolut app. Here’s how: 
1. Have them download this app and create an account
2. Approve their account from your Revolut app
3. Order their prepaid debit card from your app (personalisation fees may apply)

Find your country's age of data consent ↓

In Bulgaria, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Gibraltar, Iceland, Latvia, Malta, Norway, Portugal, Singapore, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, or the United States:
• Teens aged 13+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Teens aged 12 or under (minimum age restrictions apply) will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 13+

In Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Italy, Lithuania, or Spain:
• Teens aged 14+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 13 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 14+

In Australia, Czech Republic, Greece, or Slovenia:
• Teens aged 15+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 14 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 15+ (referrals subject to feature availability in your country)

In Croatia, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Poland, Romania, or Slovakia:
• Teens aged 16 and above can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those ages 15 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 16+
Mine Chain is a visualization revenue management application designed specifically for cryptocurrency miners. It supports manual addition of mining machines and mining records.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

description:
SuperQi is the first super-app in Iraq, your all-in-one lifestyle partner for seamless, cashless daily digital transactions.  

Simplify your life with convenient features for money transfers, scan-to-pay, bill payments, e-commerce, mobile recharge, digital billing, and more inside across Iraq and the whole world. 
 
 Key Features: 

1. Secure Transactions: Settle for the best-advanced security measures adopted to safeguard your transactions. 
2. Qi Bank Accounts Accessibility: Easily access and manage your Qi bank accounts. 
3. Mini-apps: Get set for the Super-App experience designed to enhance different aspects of your daily life and discover what apps are in SuperQi. 
4. Transfer Money Easily: Quickly transfer money between your cards or accounts with ease. 
5. Scan to Pay: Just a QR scan to complete your transactions swiftly using your phone. 
6. One-Tap Bill Payments: Instantly and securely pay your bills with just a tap. 
7. Wide Network of Merchants: For all your needs, access a diverse range of trusted merchants, from groceries, and household essentials, to traveling, and more 
8. Effortless Organization: Handily run and organize your daily essentials in one place. 
9. Anytime, Anywhere Access: Manage your account and all other affairs from anywhere, anytime. 

Use SuperQi, as the super-app does integrate with your card MasterCard or Visa, consider it your digital wallet and your payment gate, you may apply to Rafidain Bank loans, installments service, and many services like money transfer from Western Union. 
Do it with Qi.

We are on a mission to build a culturally aware financial application from the ground up in Montserrat by listening to real-life challenges you’ve shared with us.

Open your mobile money account in minutes for free - anywhere, anytime.

What’s in it for you?

- Pay and get paid in seconds by making hassle-free payments to your Serra contacts. No hidden fees, just ease.
- Enjoy contactless payments at merchants accepting Serra, a streamlined payment experience that’s secure, fast and enjoyable.
- No more queuing at the ATM, Serra gives you more options to access your money from authorised merchants.
- No minimum opening balance or monthly maintenance fees.
- Check your balances instantly and securely 24/7.
- Real-time push notifications to help track all account activity.
- Get insights on how you spend your money with our built-in analytics.*

Plus, you can also:

- Speak to helpful humans through live chat if you need any support.
- Experience better after hours money management with Serra’s dark theme, seamlessly integrated with your device’s light/dark settings.

Your privacy is guaranteed

We guard your privacy as if it’s our own. We will never sell your data to anyone.

Safeguarding your money

Our priority is ensuring your money is safe.

Serra Inc. is authorised and regulated by the Financial Services Commission of Montserrat under the Money Services Business Act, Cap. 11.30 (License No. 1/2021).

Serra is the trading name of Serra Inc., a company registered in Montserrat (Registration No. L0014/2019).

Our registered address is: Serra Inc. Davy Hill, Montserrat, West Indies.

Liobank is a digital bank in Vietnam powered by Orient Commercial Joint Stock Bank (OCB). We have made all banking processes really simple and offer you a convenient mobile banking app with a free 2-in1 bank card.

Invite your friends to become Liobank clients and earn rewards together. When your friend activates their Liobank plastic card, both you and your friend will receive 50,000₫ each.

26 reasons why Liobank will become your favorite bank:
- 2-in-1 card with combined credit and debit features and instant cashback.
- Credit limit of up to 200,000,000đ with zero interest for up to 62 days. Take out online credit loans with no paperwork.
- Pay and get up to 20% cashback on your spending and mobile top-ups cashback.
- Installment plans for up to 24 months with a low fee of only 1.7% per month. 
- 5,4% interest on your personal funds with the Savings Account Feature.
- Zero fees for fast money transfers, payments, mobile top-ups, and utility payments.
- Lowest FX fees for international payments - just 2% with no fluctuation fee or minimum fee.
- Supports Google Pay / Apple pay
- Set your own lucky account number  – it's free!
- Payment reminders and utilities payments notifications to pay for your bills.
- "Piggy" to save for your dreams and earn 4,2% annual interest.
- Control payments for linked services directly in the Liobank internet banking app with subscription management.
- Shake your phone to pay and make transfers to people nearby without needing card or phone numbers.
- Split bills for cafes or taxis among friends.
- Seamlessly transfer money funds using your phone contact list.
- Add beautiful photos to your money transfers and congratulate your friends in the most original way! 
- Cancel a payment within 10 seconds if you make a mistake.
- Respond to payments with a single touch and repeat previous payments instantly.
- Manage your card in the mobile banking app: change your PIN, block/unblock your card and set internet spending limits.
- Easily access and export card statements via the internet banking app.
- Label expenses with tags and build convenient finance analytics.
- Collect rewards for actively using your bank card.
- Use "Incognito" mode for privacy, concealing your balance and transaction amounts.
- Change your app background color with a tap.
- Use dark mode.
- React to payments with emojis instead of "thank you" or "money received."
- Choose how we address you. It could be fun when you speak with support.
- No chatbots - speak directly with our experienced support professionals anytime, anywhere.

Get your perfect Liobank 2-in-1 credit and debit card today!

Address: The Hallmark Building, 15 Tran Bach Dang Street, An Khanh Ward, Ho Chi Minh City. Tel: (84) 2 836 220 139. Company name Orient Commercial Joint Stock Bank (OCB). Business code: 0300852005

AlinmaPay is a digital wallet supervised by SAMA, available either for our partners’ individuals or business owners. Register now without the need of having bank account so you can pay to merchants using a digital card or through QR Code, paying for bills, receive and transfer locally and internationally easily and securely. Also the wallet can be used to split the bill amount with your family and friends.

AlinmaPay allows you to:
- Register immediately and without having a bank account. 
- Fund your wallet using multiple methods.
- Make purchases from merchants, restaurants, and online stores through a digital card or QR code.
- Transfer money to any local or international bank accounts quickly and with competitive fees.
- Transfer from and to AlinmaPay, request, send, or receive money to and from your family and friends, simply through your phones contacts list.
- Pay SADAD bills and MOI payments.
- Split the bill among your family and friends.
- Cash withdrawal from Alinma Bank ATMs.
- Instant Chatting with your family and friends, through your contact.

PhonePe is a payments app that allows you to use BHIM UPI, your credit card and debit card or wallet to recharge your mobile phone, pay all your utility bills and to make instant payments at your favourite offline and online stores. You can also invest in mutual funds and buy insurance plans on PhonePe. Get Car & Bike Insurance on our app.
Link your bank account on PhonePe and transfer money with BHIM UPI instantly! The PhonePe app is safe and secure, meets all your payment, investment, mutual funds, insurance and banking needs, and is much better than Internet banking.

Things you can do on PhonePe (Phonepay) App:

Money Transfer, UPI Payment, Bank Transfer
- Money Transfer with BHIM UPI
- Manage Multiple Bank Accounts – Check Account Balance, Save Beneficiaries across multiple bank accounts like SBI, HDFC, ICICI & 140+ banks.

Make Online Payments
- Make online payment on various shopping sites like Flipkart, Amazon, Myntra etc.
- Pay for online food orders from Zomato, Swiggy etc.
- Pay for online grocery orders from Bigbasket, Grofers etc.
- Pay online for travel booking from Makemytrip, Goibibo etc.

Make Offline Payments
- Scan and Pay via QR Code at local stores like kirana, food, medicines etc.

Buy or Renew Insurance Policies with PhonePe Insurance App

Health & Term Life Insurance
- Compare and buy Health & Term life Insurance with monthly premiums
- Coverage for individuals, senior citizens and families

Car & Two Wheeler Insurance
- Browse and get India’s most popular bike and car insurance
- Buy/renew your car and bike Insurance in less than 10 minutes

Other Insurance
- Personal Accident Insurance: Insure yourself against accidents & disablement
- Travel Insurance: Get international travel insurance for business and leisure trips
- Shop Insurance: Insure your shop against fire, theft, natural calamities, and burglaries.

Mutual Funds App and Investments App
- Liquid Funds: Get higher returns than savings bank 
- Tax-Saving Funds: save up to Rs. 46,800 in tax & grow your investment
- Super Funds: Achieve financial goals with expert help on our app 
- Equity Funds: High growth products curated as per risk appetite
- Debt Funds: Get stable returns for investments without any lock-in period
- Hybrid Funds: Get a balance of growth and stability 
- Buy or Sell 24K Pure Gold: Assured 24K purity, build gold savings on our app

Recharge Mobile, DTH
- Prepaid Mobile Recharge, DTH
- Recharge for Airtel, Jio, Vi, BSNL and MTNL prepaid mobile numbers
- Recharge DTH set-top boxes for TataPlay, Airtel Digital TV, Sun Direct, Dish TV and D2H providers.

Bill Payment
- Pay Credit Card Bills
- Pay Landline Bills
- Pay Electricity Bills
- Pay Water Bills
- Pay Gas Bills
- Pay Broadband Bills

Buy PhonePe Gift Cards
- Buy a PhonePe Gift Card for easy payments across 1 lakh+ leading offline and online outlets and across the PhonePe app.

Manage your refunds
- Manage and track refunds from your favorite shopping websites on PhonePe.
For more details, Visit our website at https://www.phonepe.com/

Permissions for App and reasons
SMS: to verify Phone number for registration
Location: a requirement by NPCI for UPI transactions
Contacts: for phone numbers to send money to and numbers to recharge
Camera: to scan QR code
Storage: to store scanned QR code
Accounts: to pre-populate email ID while signing up
Call: to detect single vs dual sim and let user choose
Microphone: to carry out KYC video verification

Depuis près de 10 ans, Orange Money change des vies. Orange Money est un moyen de paiement innovant par téléphone mobile qui permet aux clients d'effectuer les opérations financières suivantes, à tout moment :

Rejoignez les millions de Sénégalais qui l'utilisent et simplifiez-vous la vie.

MM 2D3D app provides Myanmar 2D/3D lottery results only.

All official data are from the Stock Exchange of Thailand (SET). You can also check the latest lottery results on the official website by yourself. Of course, if you use our app, it will be more efficient and convenient for you to quickly get the latest results and past historical data.


Times of real-time result streaming:

- Thailand working days

- Myanmar local time: 9.30AM ~ 12.01PM and 2.00PM ~ 4.30PM.

(UTC 3:00 ~ 5:30 and 7:30 ~ 10:00)

Terms of use:
** All official data are from Stock Exchange of Thailand (SET)
** Data provided for educational purpose or personal use only, not intended for trading purpose.
** Live Chat not allow personal, gambling, advertisement, sensitive, racist or confidential information.
** In order to prevent fraud/gambling, Live Chat does not allow phone number and Viber, violators will be banned.

Welcome to IDFC FIRST Bank’s Mobile Banking App. Enjoy a fast and seamless online banking experience, with integrated banking services and exciting features.

Experience the joy of:
* One-Swipe Banking: Swipe to view your account balances & manage credit card/debit card details, deposits, investments, etc
* Instant Payments & Transfers: Make secure payments, UPI transfers, and bill payments
* Zero Fee Banking: Enjoy free Savings Account services, such as money transfers, cheque re-issuance, debit card issuance, and ATM withdrawals
* Tracking Expenses: Monitor cash flow with over 20 automatically categorised transaction types. Link FIRST WOW! & Digital Rupay Credit Card with UPI, earn cashback & rewards on every payment.
* Auto-Sweep Current Accounts: BRAVO Current Accounts with Auto-Sweep to FD for higher interest rates
* Building Wealth: One screen view of your investment portfolio. Get curated investment recommendations based on your risk profile

* Personalised Offers: Get exciting offers across dining, lifestyle, travel & more
* Instant Personal Loans: Avail pre-approved loan offers at attractive interest rates & flexible tenures
* Fixed Deposit: Open an FD in 3 quick steps. Invest online & get guaranteed returns.  
Smart App Features and Services
1. Secure Fund Transfers & Payments
* Free fund transfers to any bank account without adding beneficiary
* Easy bill payment and recharge – mobile recharge, DTH & utility bills
* Earn up to 10X rewards on travel/shopping spends via credit cards, redeem anytime for exclusive discounts 
* 3-click digital bill payments
* Zero fee money transfer (मनी ट्रांसफर) to bank accounts through IMPS, NEFT, or RTGS
* Send money, pay utility & credit card bills, loan EMIs, buy/recharge FASTag, using UPI
* Link bank (बैंक) accounts & view your savings account (बचत खाता) balances with UPI

2. Investment, Mutual Funds & IPOs App:
Explore online investment services:
* Invest in Mutual Funds online with Instant SIP
* Invest in equity, debt, large-cap & multi-cap
* Save tax with ELSS mutual funds
* Invest in Unit Linked Insurance Plans (ULIP) & Online Sovereign Gold Bonds
3. Insurance App:
Buy health, bike & car insurance through our app

4. Tripstacc Benefits
* Convenient in-app flight & hotel booking experience on the IDFC FIRST Bank mobile app, powered by Tripstacc
* ZERO convenience fees on flight booking & earn 20 bonus points for every ₹100 spent on hotel bookings

5. Other Banking Services:
* Apply for debit card & cheque book via app with nil charges.
* View filtered transactions & download Smart Statement + Digest 
* Manage credit card payments, download statements, and redeem credit card (क्रेडिट कार्ड) rewards
* Quick purchase and recharge of FASTag
* Zero fee on DD & Pay order issuance & 3rd party withdrawals
* No ECS return fee & decline fee at ATMs for low funds
* Get personalised offers across loans
* One app login for retail, MSME, Customer Service, & Relationship Management

Steps to Download App & Open a Digital Banking Account (बैंक खाता):
* Download the banking app & click on open savings account (सेविंग्स अकाउंट)
* Register your details & get user ID & password
* Log in via user ID & password or mobile number & MPIN
* Set up Face ID or finger scanner (biometric) for easy log-in
* SIM Binding feature for secure banking (बैंकिंग)

Loan amount: ₹20,000 to ₹40 lakhs
Personal Loan Tenure: 6 to 60 months
Annual Percentage Rate: 11% to 28%

PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

OVERVIEW
With the Mobile Banking app from the Bank of Montserrat, you can easily take your bank with you. Our app allows you to check your balances, view account activity, transfer money, and locate branch info. Our Mobile Banking app is convenient, fast, and free! It is available to  Bank of Montserrat Customers.

Download today and enjoy the convenience of:

CHECK ACCOUNT BALANCES – Staying on top of your finances has never been so easy. View up-to-date account balances for your accounts.
TRANSFER FUNDS – Move money between your eligible accounts from the comfort of your Phone.
BRANCH LOCATOR – Find your branch by address and map.

Security is our Top Priority!  Bank of Montserrat uses a mobile banking solution with your security in mind. Mobile data transmissions are safeguarded by TLS 1.2 to prevent unauthorized access. We’ll never transmit your account number, and no private data is ever stored on your phone.

Please note: You must first contact  Bank of Montserrat to obtain a user ID and password to access mobile banking. Without a user ID and password, you will be unable to sign in with this application. Stop by or call the Bank of Montserrat today to sign up!

developer: St. Patrick's Co-operative Credit Union Ltd.
description:
Access your St. Patrick's Co-operative Credit Union (SPCCU)  accounts 24/7 from anywhere with mySPCCU. It's Fast, Secure, and Free for all SPCCU  members who are enrolled in our Internet banking service! With mySPCCU  you can: 

Check Account Balances  
View Transaction History 
Transfer Funds  
Get Current Rates  
And More! 

Available to all SPCCU Internet Banking users, mySPCCU uses the same industry standard security technologies as our online banking. Simply use your SPCCU  Internet Banking LoginID and Password. If you don't yet have a LoginID or Password just visit us at www.spccu.ms to enroll. 

Experience the convenience of mySPCCU today. Download the app and take us with you wherever you go!

Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

HTX is one of the leading crypto exchanges in the world. Here at HTX, you can buy and sell Bitcoins and other cryptocurrencies quickly and easily. Since its inception in 2013, HTX boasts an unmatched record of zero security incidents and has firmly established itself as the trusted industry leader with over 40 million users worldwide.

Crypto Offerings
HTX offers trading and other services for more than 1,000 virtual assets, including but not limited to Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT), Chainlink (LINK), Tether (USDT), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Ordinals (ORDI), and Satoshi (SATS). We are always expanding our crypto offerings as we stay at the forefront of the latest crypto listings.

Buy/Sell Cryptos with Fiat Currencies
Buy BTC, ETH, LINK, ADA, ORDI, SATS, and more at HTX with fiat currencies. Simply add a credit card and you can buy and sell cryptos instantly. HTX supports payments in dozens of fiat currencies including USD, EUR, GBP, CHF, AUD, INR, THB, and payment methods such as VISA credit cards to provide you with a fuss-free experience for your crypto purchases.

Spot Trading
You can easily buy or sell over 500 cryptos in the spot market at HTX, such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT), Chainlink (LINK), Tether (USDT), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Ordinals (ORDI), Satoshi (SATS), etc.

Futures Trading
HTX supports futures trading for both USDT-margined and Coin-margined futures contracts, allowing you to go long or short on hundreds of cryptos including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT), Chainlink (LINK), Tether (USDT), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Ordinals (ORDI), and Satoshi (SATS).

Real-time Alerts
Our crypto price alert system will notify you immediately when a specified condition or price is met, helping you to stay on top of the market with up-to-date price signals. HTX Futures also supports hedging and arbitrage with our derivatives products, namely coin-margined and USDT-margined contracts.

Tutorials for Beginners
At HTX, you can find all sorts of educational content and informative materials to improve your knowledge in crypto, blockchain, DeFi, metaverse, NFT, ordinal inscription, and anything related to the crypto world. Through a smooth learning experience, you are able to understand and stay up-to-date with the latest industry information.

Copy Trading
With HTX Copy Trading, you have the option to freely follow seasoned traders to earn profits while learning professional trading strategies from them. The user-friendly approach is particularly well-suited for beginners.

HTX Community
HTX boasts the largest content community in the crypto world and features exceptional live streams. At HTX, you can access cutting-edge industry insights, engage with a wealth of KOLs, and stay up-to-date with the latest information.

HTX is the trusted industry leader with an ever-growing user base. Join us today and buy Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT), Chainlink (LINK), Tether (USDT), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Ordinals (ORDI), Satoshi (SATS), and other cryptos. Not only you can enjoy low trading fees for all cryptocurrencies, you can also buy, sell, and swap cryptos 24/7. Our customer service is available 24/7 to provide timely support and assistance to all our users, whether you are an entry-level beginner or a seasoned trader.

Join us on: 
Official website: https://www.htx.com

Coinbase is the global leader and only crypto company listed in the S&P 500 to seamlessly buy, sell, trade, store, and stake crypto. We’re the only publicly traded crypto exchange in the U.S.

SUPPORTED ASSETS¹
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), USD Coin (USDC), Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Polkadot (DOT), Solana (SOL), Tether (USDT), Uniswap (UNI), Dogecoin (DOGE), Pepe (PEPE), and hundreds of other cryptocurrencies.

Here’s a little taste of what Coinbase offers:

COINBASE ONE
Get more out of crypto with Coinbase One.
- Zero trading fees², priority support, and more.³ 

BUY, SELL & MANAGE CRYPTO
- Coinbase is a global leading platform to build, manage, and track your crypto portfolio.
- Send and receive crypto.
- Stake crypto and earn yield on cryptocurrencies like Ethereum and Cardano¹
- Set up automatic or recurring buys.
- Follow the latest crypto news and track prices.
- Transfer crypto internationally.

PUBLICLY TRADED CRYPTO EXCHANGE
- Coinbase is the only publicly traded, US-headquartered crypto exchange (NASDAQ: COIN).
- Our financials are public and audited quarterly by a Big 4 accounting firm.
- Encryption and security are at the core of our platform, and our security team is constantly working to make sure you and your assets are protected from emerging threats.

POWERFUL TOOLS FOR ADVANCED CRYPTO TRADERS
- Buy and sell crypto using advanced trading tools and earn staking rewards¹
- Access in-depth technical analysis, advanced real-time order books, and charting powered by TradingView.
- Advanced tools to research and analyze crypto markets to inform trading decisions.

NEED MORE HELP?
Visit help.coinbase.com for information and to contact Coinbase Support.

PRIVACY
View Coinbase’s legal privacy policy at https://www.coinbase.com/legal/privacy

Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high‑risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. Take 2 mins to learn more at www.coinbase.com/uk-fca-info
—
Trusted by users: Based on the results of a 2024 Qualtrics survey conducted in the UK. Read more here: https://www.coinbase.com/blog/recent-data-shows-coinbase-is-the-most-trusted-name-in-crypto

¹ Available in select territories.
² Zero trading fees: Coinbase Advanced excluded; a spread applies.
³ A Coinbase One subscription renews automatically and requires recurring payments. Benefits vary by region. 


You earn rewards from the protocol, not Coinbase. Coinbase acts only as a service provider connecting you, the validators, and the protocol. We pass along any rewards earned from staking, minus a transparent Coinbase fee.

MAKE YOUR MONEY MORE MONZO

Hi, we're Monzo – a bank that lives on your phone.

Numbers are kind of our thing. Here are a few of our favourites:

• 11 million: how many people bank with us
• 10: the minutes it takes to open a personal or business bank account (you can use the Current Account Switch Service too)
• 24/7: the hours and days you can chat to our customer support

You'll need a Monzo current account to access Investments, Instant Access Savings Pots and Monzo Flex Credit Card.


GET TO KNOW WHERE YOUR MONEY GOES

• Get instant notifications when money comes in and out of your account
• Learn about your spending habits with weekly and monthly insights
• Schedule your bills or regular monthly payments and manage subscriptions
• Get that payday feeling one business day early when your salary is paid via Bacs
• Free yourself from travel fees. Pay anywhere and in any currency on your debit or credit card. (We pass Mastercard's exchange rate directly onto you, without any hidden fees.)


SUPERCHARGE YOUR SAVINGS WITH POTS

• Create personalised Pots to separate your spending money and savings
• Turn your spare change into savings with automatic roundups
• Earn interest on your money with Savings Pots

SPLIT AND PAY THE MONZO WAY

• Split bills, send payment reminders, and keep track of joint costs
• Easily request money or make payments with a link (limits apply, £500 for requesting money and £250 for making payments with a link)

MONZO INVESTMENTS: LEAVE THE HARD WORK TO US

You must be over 18 years old to use this feature.

• Choose from 3 investment options based on the level of risk you’re happy with
• Start with as little as £1
• Grow your investing know-how with bite-sized topics on investing essentials
• The value of your investments may go up or down. You could get back less than you put in.



MONZO FLEX: AN AWARD-WINNING CREDIT CARD


Monzo Flex is a credit card you can count on. It gives you real-time balance updates, a credit limit up to £3,000 and a 0% offer you can use time and time again.

Monzo Flex was voted Best Credit Card at the 2024 Card & Payments Awards

• Protect eligible purchases made with the Flex card with Section 75 Protection
• Apply from your Monzo bank account. Eligibility criteria and Ts&Cs apply. 18+ year olds only. Not keeping up with payments may negatively impact your credit score.
• Representative example: 29% APR representative (variable). £1200 credit limit. 29% yearly interest (variable).



MONZO BUSINESS: IT JUST WORKS, SO YOU CAN TOO

Monzo Business Banking helps small businesses stay on top of their finances. Voted Best Business Banking Provider at the 2024 British Bank Awards.


• Manage money for your business with no monthly fee or go Business Pro for £9 per month with automatic Tax Pots, integrated accounting, multi-user access for limited companies, invoicing and more
• Make international payments from your bank account (powered by Wise, fees apply)
• Only sole traders and limited company directors in the UK can apply. Ts&Cs apply.



Your eligible deposits in Monzo are protected by The Financial Services Compensation Scheme (FSCS) up to a value of £85,000 per person.

Registered address: Broadwalk House, 5 Appold St, London EC2A 2AG
